name: Gumloop
headline: A no-code platform for automating workflows with AI
description:
Gumloop is a platform for automating repetitive and complex workflows end-to-end with AI. 

Builders drag, drop, and connect modular components onto a canvas to build powerful automations.

We provide the tools and the infrastructure to operate at 10x the speed of writing, testing, and productionizing code so you can focus on the problem at hand.

founders.name: Rahul Behal, Founder
founders.description:
I have a couple of years of industry experience in software engineering including time at Amazon and as a Machine Learning Engineer. I also worked as an Investment Banker for a little while.

I love solving incredibly hard challenges at scale while learning cutting edge technologies and tools. Building AgentHub -- a next generation platform for building AI powered pipelines to automate business workflows.

generated_description:
**Gumloop: Simplifying AI-Driven Workflow Automation**

Founded in 2023 and backed by Y Combinator's W24 batch, Gumloop is on a mission to democratize workflow automation with its no-code platform. By allowing users to drag, drop, and configure modular components on an intuitive canvas, Gumloop empowers both technical and non-technical users to automate complex processes without writing a single line of code.

### Key Features

- **Intuitive Design**: Easy-to-use interface where users can visually map out workflows.
- **Rapid Deployment**: Operate at 10x speed compared to traditional coding—perfect for those who want to focus on solving problems instead of getting bogged down in development.
- **AI-Enhanced Automation**: Leverage powerful AI capabilities for tasks like web scraping, document processing, and SEO automation, all without needing extensive technical know-how.

### Recent Highlights

Gumloop recently secured a **$17 million Series A** funding round, which will help ramp up its development and further refine its offerings. With its enterprise-ready features—like SOC 2 Type 2 compliance and state-of-the-art encryption—it's clear that Gumloop prioritizes security and scalability as integral parts of its platform.

### Growing Community and Use Cases

The platform is built on a foundation of community feedback, and users are already seeing significant productivity boosts. One user reported a **65% increase in meetings year-over-year**, showcasing the tangible impact of Gumloop on everyday business operations.

Gumloop integrates seamlessly with major platforms (think Google, Slack, GitHub) and encourages collaboration by allowing teams to build workflows together. Plus, there’s no need to bother engineering teams for support when users can create and launch their own tools right from the platform.

### Start Your Automation Journey

If you find yourself overwhelmed with repetitive tasks and need a way to streamline your workflow, Gumloop is here to help. You can start for free and experience firsthand how simple it can be to automate your workflows with AI. 

For more information, check out their official website: [Gumloop](https://www.gumloop.com/).

In summary, Gumloop is not just another automation tool. It's a game-changing platform aimed at making AI-driven workflow automation accessible to everyone, no matter their background. If your processes are cluttered and you want to reclaim your time, give Gumloop a try.
